subject: Photography
title: AI-Generated Images
description: A quick win: understand AI-Generated Images.

hook.text: Type a sentence and get a photorealistic image. AI generators like Midjourney and DALL-E create images from text.

buildup.text: These tools use machine learning trained on billions of images to generate new visuals that never existed.

discovery.text: AI images won photography contests before judges realized they weren't photographs. The line is now invisible.

twist.text: Photographers fear obsolescence. But AI can't replicate the experience of being present at a real moment.

climax.text: AI generation challenges the very definition of photography. If no light hit a sensor, is it still a photo?

punchline.text: AI makes images. Photographers make meaning.

quiz.question: What fundamental challenge do AI-generated images pose to photography?
options: They question whether an image must be captured by a camera to be called a photograph
They produce lower quality than cameras
They can only create abstract art
